desc: Here is where you can shop for AMERICAN MADE FARM GROWN merchandise produced with the wool from our happy flock. Our wool is naturally dyed on the farm by us. Bags are hand made. Find knitting tools, teeshirts, sweatshirts, hats, yarn, knitting project bags & more! We are TRULY SHEEP TO SKEIN. WE DO IT ALL RIGHT HERE.

layout.text: Know their names. The lives they lead. The family who cares for them. Sheep to skein in the truest form. The planet doesn't need more stuff. It needs better.
